subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Tampa Bay third baseman Evan Longoria was activated off the 15-day disabled list Saturday after he said he felt “almost 100 percent” following 30 swings with a regular bat. Longoria, out since Aug. 7 after being hit by a pitch from Seattle’s J. J. Putz, had not swung a bat in four days because of pain in his fractured right wrist.
